sub_fields.placeholder: How many posts would you like to include?
sub_fields.label: Feature Content Limit
sub_fields.name: feature_content_module_limit

sub_fields.label: How many colums will you have?
sub_fields.name: how_many_colums_will_you_have

sub_fields.label: How wide will the columns be?
sub_fields.name: how_wide_will_the_columns_be
sub_fields.instructions: Use narrow if there is too much horizontal spacing between the features

sub_fields.label: Select a Background Image
sub_fields.name: full_width_module_background
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background for your module, if you want to use a solid color instead leave this option blank

sub_fields.label: Select a Background Color
sub_fields.name: full_width_module_solid_color
sub_fields.instructions:
Retail is Purple. 

Restaurant is Green.
 
eCommerce is Blue.

sub_fields.label: Module spacing
sub_fields.name: full_width_module_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Adjusting the spacing of the module. Use "More" when it is the top hero header. Use "Less" when its' all text based and needs to be closer to other elements.

sub_fields.label: Margin Bottom
sub_fields.name: full_width_margin_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: This will add 50px margin bottom to the module if selected. The default value is 0px.

sub_fields.label: Select a Foreground Image
sub_fields.name: full_width_foreground
sub_fields.instructions:
Required Image Size: 576px by 384px. (or about 600x400).

(This only shows up when the Content Width is Half and Content Alignment is not Center).

sub_fields.label: Title HTML Tag
sub_fields.name: full_width_title_html_tag
sub_fields.instructions: Make sure there is only one "H1" tag per page.

sub_fields.label: Title Font Size
sub_fields.name: full_width_title_font_size
sub_fields.instructions: Only use this if you would like to change the default styling of the HTML Tag. For example, you want to create an H2 with H1 font-size.

sub_fields.label: Sub Title HTML Tag
sub_fields.name: full_width_sub_title_html_tag
sub_fields.instructions: If it's a lot of text it is most likely a "P" HTML Tag.

sub_fields.label: Sub Title Font Size
sub_fields.name: full_width_sub_title_font_size
sub_fields.instructions: Only use this if you would like to change the default styling of the HTML Tag. For example, you want to create an H2 with H1 font-size.

sub_fields.label: CTA Text
sub_fields.name: full_width_module_call_to_action
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the text to use as a Call To Action

sub_fields.label: No Credit Card Required
sub_fields.name: full_width_no_credit_card_required
sub_fields.instructions: Add "No Credit Card Required" to CTA

sub_fields.label: Margin bottom
sub_fields.name: half_width_margin_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: This indicates the spacing at the bottom of the module.

sub_fields.label: Quote background color
sub_fields.name: quote_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the HEX color value that will be the background of the quote box.

sub_fields.label: Module Theme
sub_fields.name: module_theme
sub_fields.instructions: The theme changes the color of icons.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon_name
sub_fields.instructions: Select the icon you wish to display.

sub_fields.label: Add a new Row to create a column of text
sub_fields.name: three_columns_text_repeater

sub_fields.label: Add a new Row to create a column of text
sub_fields.name: two_columns_text_repeater
